casebody.data:
Derrick SCOTT
v.
DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY AND CORRECTIONS No. 2018-I-0300 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 16, 2018

ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE NINETEENTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT, PARISH OF EAST BATON ROUGE

PER CURIAM:

WRIT NOT CONSIDERED. Petitioner has not demonstrated that he sought review in the court(s) below before filing in this Court nor shown the "extraordinary circumstances" that would justify bypassing that level of review. La.S.Ct.R. X § (b).
